channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Steam Days
channel.desc: First transmitted in 1986, Miles Kington travels across the western Highlands on one of the most picturesque railways in Britain, from Fort William to Mallaig.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Train Now Departing
channel.desc: Programme from 1988 that examines the events surrounding the proposed closure of the Settle to Carlisle line, one of the most magnificent stretches of railway in England.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Brief Encounter
channel.desc: A chance meeting in a railway station brings together two married people.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Sarah Churchwell Remembers... The Great Gatsby
channel.desc: Sarah Churchwell looks at the origins and inspiration behind F Scott Fitzgerald's novel.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Great Gatsby
channel.desc: Film drama. In the volatile era of the twenties, flamboyant millionaire Jay Gatsby pursues the seductive Daisy, the love he lost while serving in the First World War.
